0   # initial state
[7]  # termainal state
(0,0,'!a',RewardControl())
(0,1,'a',RewardControl())
(1,1,'!b',RewardControl())
(1,2,'b',RewardControl())
(2,2,'!c',RewardControl())
(2,3,'c',RewardControl())
(3,3,'!d',RewardControl())
(3,4,'d',RewardControl())
(4,4,'!e',RewardControl())
(4,5,'e',RewardControl())
(5,5,'!f',RewardControl())
(5,6,'f',RewardControl())
(6,6,'!g',RewardControl())
(6,7,'d',RewardControl(1000))
